name: Exploratory Data Analysis
learning-objectives: Differentiate between Exploratory Data Analysis and Data Preprocessing.
Find statistics about each column in a `DataFrame`.
Use visualizations to aid in the analysis of a dataset.
Select appropriate visualizations to use for analysis.
Reformat visualizations to improve conveyance of information.
Interpret visualizations to answer questions about a dataset.
Identify and fill in missing data points in a dataset.
Identify and correct broken data points in a dataset.
Use advanced Pandas techniques to answer questions about a dataset.
